NomaiObject: Excavation Site 1 OENO: Daz, the construction of the Sanctuary has been going swimmingly thanks to your help! Your new voyager stones are truly a revolutionary piece of technology. 2 1 OENO: However, during our time voyaging, I encountered some.. strange occurrences which I would like to inquire about. 3 2 OENO: To start, working in shifts with Coleus, voyaging into the Sanctuary seemed to always transport me some distance outside of the projection pool. 4 3 OENO: In the dark, this has caused me to stumble off the tiny island more times than I wish to admit! Is this an intended feature, or some strange quirk of the voyager stone? 5 2 OENO: More distressingly: at some point, I began to hear.. thoughts that were not my own. It was like there was another person in my mind while I was voyaging! 6 5 OENO: Assuming my mind has not become aberrant, I understand the voyager stones work using the Ash Twin Project's memory storage systems. 7 6 OENO: Coleus posits perhaps there was some sort of mix-up between our memory masks from using the same voyager stone, but he had no such experience himself while voyaging. 8 7 OENO: Coleus insisted I rest while he continued to work, so I decided to visit your workshop today to ask about these experiences. I would deeply appreciate if you could investigate their causes, Daz! Workshop EX2 4 Workshop EX3 5
